Method Detail

readDataFromFile

public static double[] readDataFromFile(java.lang.String filename,
                                        int desiredArrayLength)
Reads double data from a file.

Parameters:
filename - the name of the file to be read, which should be in the project folder
desiredArrayLength - the desired length of the returned array, which should be the number of doubles in the entire file
Returns:
an array consisting of all the doubles in the file, which should be desiredArrayLength long; if there is a issue reading from the file, or the file does not contain exactly desiredArrayLength doubles, then this method returns an empty array (length = 0)
